descriptionHtml:
Sometimes your skill won\'t return to normal after disease is cured (like rockjoint). 
Your skill will show in red, but there are no active effects under the magic menu debuffing the skill.

heres how to fix it: (Replace skillX with the name of the skill i.e. twohanded)

open console (tilde key)
type:    player.modav skillX 1
close console, and then reopen it
type:    player.modav skillX -1
close the console

bye bye bugged debuff
author: Sploid
